title: Mr Hughes Goes to Washington
description: On Monday Coleman Hughes testified before the house judiciary subcommittee. He would go on to receive harsh backlash for arguing his position against reparations for the descendants of slaves. Here I outline the ideology such backlash was based in, and why it concerns me
